targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "unbound")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_up")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gpu_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "experimental"
newStart = experimental.addDuration(
  d: -6h,
  to: v.timeRangeStart,
)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: newStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download_bandwidth")
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8 })  )

import "experimental"
newStart = experimental.addDuration(
  d: -6h,
  to: v.timeRangeStart,
)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: newStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upload_bandwidth")
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8 })  )

import "experimental"
newStart = experimental.addDuration(
  d: -6h,
  to: v.timeRangeStart,
)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: newStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ping_latency")

import "experimental"
newStart = experimental.addDuration(
  d: -6h,
  to: v.timeRangeStart,
)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: newStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ping_jitter")

import "experimental"
newStart = experimental.addDuration(
  d: -6h,
  to: v.timeRangeStart,
)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: newStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packet_loss")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_activeopens")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "domains_being_blocked")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "unique_clients")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ads_blocked_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dns_queries_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pihole_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ads_percentage_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu")
      |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["cpu"] == "cpu-total" and
    r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._field != "usage_idle"
  )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r["cpu"] == "cpu-total" and
    r._field == "usage_idle" and
    r["host"] == "${host}"
  )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "shared" or r["_field"] == "cached" or r["_field"] == "buffered" or r["_field"] == "mapped" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "${disk}")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "soft_interrupts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns:["irq"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interrupts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns:["irq"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "io_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "mmcblk0" or r["name"] == "sda")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "in" or r["_field"] == "out")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "experimental"
newStart = experimental.addDuration(
  d: -6h,
  to: v.timeRangeStart,
)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: newStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download_bandwidth" or r["_field"] == "upload_bandwidth" )
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8 })  )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "tun0")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packets_recv" or r["_field"] == "packets_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^udp_.*/)
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "err_in" or r["_field"] == "err_out" or r["_field"] == "drop_out" or r["_field"] == "drop_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "eth0")  
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /.*icmp_.*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] !~ /.*msg.*/)
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "unbound")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_num_cachehits" or r["_field"] == "total_num_cachemiss" or r["_field"] == "total_num_prefetch" or r["_field"] == "total_num_queries" or r["_field"] == "total_num_queries_ip_ratelimited" or r["_field"] == "total_num_recursivereplies" or r["_field"] == "total_num_zero_ttl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: false)
  |> yield(name: "derivative")

list.label: Hostname
list.name: host
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "host",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.measurementTagValues(
    bucket: v.defaultBucket,
    measurement: "disk",
    tag: "device"
)

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk_io
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.measurementTagValues(
    bucket: v.defaultBucket,
    measurement: "diskio",
    tag: "name"
)
